name: UML 2 Statemachine for C++

screenshots.caption: Transform your UML based model with the help of an easy to understand Domain-specific language (DSL). Your architecture can be directly created in an intuitive manner. Transitions are precisely defined by UML's syntax: source + event [guard] / action == target.

One DSL description can be used to create an application for different operating systems and platforms. Currently Linux (32-bit, 64-bit), Mac OS X Lion and Microsoft Windows 7 (32-bit, 64-bit) are supported.
Use your favorite UML editor (e.g. Dia, VisualParadigm) to draw large scale complex systems with hundreds of states and transitions.

short_description: UML 2 Statemachine Code Generator is a developer framework for an easy implementation of statemachine based applications. Here, with this framework only one Domain-specific language (DSL) specification is necessary to create executable codes for Linux, Mac OS X, and Microsoft Windows. With this framework you save a lot of time and effort during implementation; also you have an always valid - based on a well-defined C++ standard - generated code with high quality.
summary: UML 2 Statemachine for C++ is a development framework with DSL support
